mapper.select: select COUNT(idx) from tb_area where del_yn = 'N'
select idx , lat , lng , percent , area_nm as "areaNm" , create_dt as "createDt" from tb_area where del_yn = 'N' limit #{limitStartNo}, #{pageSize}
select lat , lng , device_id as "deviceId" , count(idx) as "alarmCnt" from tb_area_log where del_yn = 'N' and device_id = #{deviceId} group by lat, lng
select lat , lng , evt1 , evt2 , evt3 , evt4 , evt5 , evt6 , evt7 , evt8 , evt9 , evt10 , evt11 from tb_area_event where del_yn = 'N' and lat = #{lat} and lng = #{lng}

select idx , lat , lng , percent , (6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{lat})) * cos(radians(lat)) * cos(radians(lng) - radians(#{lng})) + sin(radians(#{lat})) * sin(radians(lat)))) as "distance" , month
from tb_area where CAST(percent AS UNSIGNED) >= CAST(#{percent} AS UNSIGNED)
and month like concat(#{month},'-','%') or month like concat('%','-',#{month})
having distance < 20
mapper.update: update tb_area set del_yn = 'Y' where idx = #{idx}
